Name: Jacktini
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A citrus bite and a smooth Tennessee draw enhanced with rich mandarin liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Jacktini contains 213 calories
